And Sam had other skills and talents too. Which Carrie was about to discover.

It started off as a typical Saturday morning. Carrie was woken up to sounds of her cat Fluffy and her parakeet simply known as Parakeet arguing. About what, Carrie didn't know, since she was neither conversant in cat nor parakeet. But they were making a lot of noise, so she decided to go to the kitchen and make some coffee.

When she turned on her faucet, nothing happened. Grumbling, she tried other faucets in the house and found they were working. So it was just the kitchen faucet. Great, she thought to herself, I'm going to have to get dressed so I can call the plumber over.

So Carrie called Sam, told him the problem, and he told her he'd be over in about half an hour. Carrie thanked him and changed into jeans and a sweatshirt. She then decided she should probably take a look at what was under the sink, in case there was a leak that needed to be cleaned up.

Carrie had just opened up the cabinet, without even a chance to look inside, when there was a loud crash in the living room. Carrie went in to see Fluffy had knocked over Parakeet's cage, releasing Parakeet. Fluffy was in hot pursuit of Parakeet. Carrie tried to catch Fluffy, but the cat was too fast for her. Both zipped into the kitchen and into the open cabinet under the sink. There was a loud Pop, and a few seconds later...

A miniaturized Fluffy and Parakeet came out, no longer interested in their game of chase.

Carrie had no idea how she had the presence of mind to do so, but she caught Fluffy and Parakeet, put them in separate Red Solo cups, and covered the cups with paper plates. She then bent down to see what was under the sink that could have done this.

Her jaw dropped at what she saw; It looked like a miniature version of one of those depictions of a black hole. It was co-located over the pipes leading up to the faucet.

Just then there was a knock on the door.

Carrie opened up the door to see Sam, with a toolbox in one hand.

"Well, let's see if we can't get that faucet running," Sam said.

"Uh, I think it's more than a clogged pipe," Carrie announced. "It's a...well, it's hard to describe. In fact, you might want to...well, I don't think it's going to be something you can handle."

Sam arched an eyebrow. "Why don't we let me take a look at it first before we decide I can't deal with it."

Carrie shrugged. She had no previous with miniature black holes that shrank household pets. Maybe Sam would have an idea of how to deal with.

When Sam knelt down, he didn't faint or go into shock or anything like that. He just pursed his lips and shook his head.

"Looks like you got an extra-dimensional aperture with a shrinking inducement affecting organic material and organic components. That's why you're not getting any water. The water is shrinking at the point where the aperture intersects your pipes there." As Sam stood up, he looked around. "Hey, where's Fluffy? That cat is usually under my feet when I'm trying to work."

"Uh, here." Carrie showed Sam where she had the cat and bird in cups.

"Poor little guys," Sam said, shaking his head. "Definitely a class G shrinking aperture. You're about five six, right Carrie?"

Carrie nodded, still stunned at the surreal situation, as well as Sam's blase reaction to it.

"Well, if a person such as yourself were to come into contact with an aperture like that, it would shrink you down to six inches in height, with a corresponding reduction of mass, of course. Hang on a second, I've got the thing to take care of Fluffy and Parakeet."

Sam went back to his tool box, and pulled out a willow wand. He took a very complacent Fluffy out of the Solo Cup, waved the wand over Fluffy and the cat was instantly back to its normal size. Sam repeated the process and got the same results.

Neither cat nor bird felt inclined to chase or be chased the other.

"I'm going to need you to get them in some kind of carry cages or something," Sam explained. "i'll need to watch over them for a couple of days, to make sure there's no side effects."

"Of course," Carrie said, still a little weirded out that Sam acted like this was just the most natural thing in the world that could happen. Carrie put Parakeet back in his cage with no problem. She then put Fluffy in his pet carrier. Normally Fluffy would fight like hell to stay out of the pet carrier. Today, though, he went into the pet carrier without a sound.

When Carrie came back, Sam had closed the cabinet doors, and was pouring a line of fine red powder in front of the cabinet.

"So, is that going to fix it?" Carrie asked.

Sam shook his head. "Sorry, it'll just contain it. There is a potion that will collapse the aperture on itself, but it has a real short shelf life, so I have to make it fresh. It takes about twenty-four hours to prepare. Until then, it's perfectly safe to stay here. Just don't go under that sink. Understand?" Sam said sternly.

An image of a shrunken Fluffy and Parakeet came to mind. "Right. Don't go under the sink. Not a problem."

Sam nodded. "I'll be back tomorrow. Don't worry. Once you clear up an aperture, you never have a reappearance."

Carrie could only wonder how many of these apertures Sam had seen that allowed him to make a definitive statement like that.

Once Sam left, Carrie went about her business. That evening, Carrie ordered a pizza and watched a movie, not giving that shrinking black hole a thought.

Well, not many thoughts. She would have asked Sam a ton of questions this morning, if she had had the presence of mind. But dealing with a miniature black hole under your kitchen sink, along with miniaturized house pets, can throw a girl off her game.

Well, Carrie would just write down her questions and ask Sam in the morning. When he came to "fix" the miniature black hole, spinning under her kitchen sink.

But Carrie really, really wanted to do was take one last peek at.that black hole. What could it hurt?

And she really, really need to resist that urge.

In the end, Carrie

113.content:
A lot of women aspire to be Imelda Marcos. Well, actually just to have as many shoes as Imelda Marcos did.

Carrie was one of those women. And she had a secret weapon in her quest for shoes. Tom.

Tom was the eighteen year old grandson of the owner of The Shoe Emporium, a local store that carried a huge selection of shoes, from low end discount to high end designer shoes.

Tom had no desire to take over the family business. He had almost the opposite of a foot fetish. He didn't dislike feet, per se. He just didn't see how people could make that the focus of their sexual attraction of someone.

But Tom wanted to go to college, to study electronic engineering and physics. He was already quite the inventor to start with, but wanted the formal education to supplement what he already knew, and to open up career opportunities. And to get money for college,Tom had to work in the family business.

So Tom worked as a stock boy. He could have probably worked the floor, but as was discussed earlier, Tom wasn't attracted to other people's feet, and the thought of having to handle dozens of feet everyday frankly turned his stomach.,

And then Tom met Carrie. Carrie was, in a word, beautiful. And those breasts of hers. WOW! Firm and large, with a size that let you know Carrie was going to enter a room a couple of seconds before she did. Well, maybe not THAT big, but there were definitely more than a handful.

Tom was carrying in boxes when Carrie walked in. All the salespeople were busy, so one of the guys on the floor told Tom to help Carrie out. Tom was pale and nervous but Carrie had that effect on a lot of men On someone as young as Tom, Carrie actually found the effect sweet and endearing.

Tom got to handle Carrie's ankles when he helped her try on shoes, and he was in heaven at the feel of the smoothness of her legs. To keep up the contact, Tom brought out all the shoes he knew of in Carrie's size that were marked down due to slight, barely visible irregularities.

After that point, Tom became Carrie's personal shoe salesman. He would even send her emails and texts when the shoe store just got a very rare designer shoe, when a sale was being planned, or if there was a slightly irregular pair of shoes that Carrie might be interested.

The Shoe Store was more than happy with Tom being a personal salesman to a regular customer, and Carrie liked the shopping opportunities it gave her. She had no problems with flirting with the 18 year old boy. He was, of course, too young for her to seriously consider dating, but little harmless flirting didn't hurt anybody.

And Tom got to handle the smooth skin of her ankles.

Of course, Tom wanted more. He wanted to feel all her legs, not just her ankles and calves. And he really wanted to see and touch and suck on those breasts of hers. But that just wasn't going to happen.

Or was it?

Tom was an inventor after all. Of course, modern inventors working from their basement don't find ways to bend the laws of physics to satisfy their personal lusts.

Or do they?

Because one day Tom found a way to shrink an object down an eleventh of its original size.

Tom tried it out on shoes (of course), furniture, electronics. It all shrank! And in the case of the electronics, it all worked perfectly. And when he unshrunk them, they were all perfectly fine.

Next, Tom shrank different kinds of plants and animals. They were all perfectly fine when tiny (though in the case of the animals, understandably freaked out), and they were all okay when they were unshrunk.

And then Tom decided he wanted to shrink Carrie. He had to have her. He had to get to know that body of hers better. But a full size Carrie was beyond his reach.

A shrunken Carrie, though...

And so Tom laid out a plan to shrink Carrie. He would call her up about an unbelievable shoe deal, but it would only be available after hours. And she would have to come get it at the store's...

121.content:
In a lot of ways, Red Kryptonite was more dangerous than Green Kryptonite. Where as Green Kryptonite would weaken, and potentially kill a Kryptonian, Red Kryptonite would remove the inhibitions of Kryptonians and humans alike, taking away their mental governors that prevented them from acting on their impulses. But that was all Red Kryptonite usually did.

Usually.

One piece of Krypton, on its journey from Krypton to Earth, passed through an anomaly that changed its properties. It no longer removed the inhibitions of those who touched it. In fact,, it actually made the people who came in contact with the person who originally touched the red kryptonite want to be nicer to the victims.

Did I say victim? Well, I guess that would be an appropriate description.

You see, this particular red kryptonite existed in multiple points of time, so that when it was encountered, several people touched it at once, at different points in the timeline, causing the rock to explode and, incidentally, causing the women who touched it to shrink.

So, in the world of Smallville, Supergirl was shrunk to six inches tall, but she wasn't the only one. At different times, different Smallville women were shrunk to six inches. So which woman's shrinking adventure shall we follow?

1212.content:
Things had gotten weird lately.

Smallville had always been odd, especially after the meteor shower that occurred just before Lana was born. But recent events had prompted Lana's Aunt to send the recent eighteen year old to live with a distant cousin, rather than letting her stay with the Sullivan family in Smallville.

Lana wasn't too thrilled at first, having to stay on a dairy farm to the north of Central City. But the charm of the farm grew on her, she made new friends at the high school in the nearby town of Dairy Town.

All in all, her senior year at high school was turning out to be pretty good.

Danny was a happy man. Mostly.

He was married to a highly successful and highly motivated woman who provided for the family. So even though Danny was a successful illustrator who worked from his home office and who could have supported his family, he didn't have to. In fact, his money was his own, to do what he wanted, while his wife made sure the family lived in the lap of luxury.

That should make him happy, right.

And his nineteen year old stepdaughter, Freda, who was a dead ringer for Selena Gomez, save that she had a larger bust (at least two cup sizes) and kept her hair near waist length, well, she was a good kid, right? Never sassed back to him, never teased him (intentionally, anyway), was probably still a virgin (to the best of his knowledge), was doing well at the local college, and was even babysitting tonight. She was all you could ask for in a stepdaughter.

Except, as Freda's mother stayed on the road longer and longer, Danny found his thoughts about his stepdaughter becoming less and less fatherly.

Danny would never act on those feelings, of course. If for no other reason than there would be dire consequences. But it didn't stop those thoughts from coming.

Then one day, quite by accident, Danny discovered the world of shrunken women.

It wasn't Danny's first encounter with the idea of shrunken women, of course. Danny remembered stumbling across an old tv show, from the 1960s, where a spaceship of people crash landed on a world where everything is ten times its normal size.

Danny was sure he wasn't the first man to fantasize about being a giant and getting a hold of either or both of the female actresses who played two of the tiny humans. But he knew it was just that: a fantasy. There were all sorts of physical laws and such about why there couldn't be such things as tiny humans or giant humans. So Danny grew tired of the show and moved on to other fantasies.

It was quite by accident that he was Googling the show about nine months ago when he came across a link to a link to a link which led to a page on the underside of the internet. And the page promised, for an exorbitant price, a five and a half inch woman for her new owner to play with. The page even promised to find you a shrunken woman who would come close to the idea of the woman you wanted shrunk.

Or a military commander was replaced with someone more or less competent. Or...

However, in most of those universes, she also had starred in a pilot for Wonder Woman that followed the mood and tempo set by the Batman played by Adam West.

However, there was a universe where Wonder Woman looked identical to how Linda Harrison had portrayed her in the pilot, just as there was a universe where there was a Nova who looked identical to Linda Harrison.

So Tolliver harnessed the meteorite, pushed a few buttons, then pushed THE BUTTON, and voila. On the table in his lab, he produced a six inch
1522.title: Linda Harrison

153.content:
(The scenario below is a play off the Justice League Unlimited episode "This Little Piggy.")

Everyone has enemies, though some people have more people than others. And some people have enemies because of the people they know. Case in point, Wonder Woman.

Wonder Woman's mother, Hippolyta, had been responsible for banishing Circe to Tartarus. When Circe was paroled from Tartarus, one of the conditions of her parole was the she couldn't do anything to directly retaliate against Hippolyta.

Her parole officers didn't set any restrictions ln retaliating against Hippolyta's daughter. So when Wonder Woman caught Circe trying to steal the Rosetta Stone, Circe used her magic to shrink Wonder Woman down to six inches tall.

Our story begins with Wonder Woman being six inches tall, while her stakeout partner figure out what to do. In this case, her stakeout partner was
153.title: Some jealous girls

choices: reluctantly decides to help Wonder Woman get back to the Watch Tower
decides to have a little fun with Wonder Woman
1534.content:
It was bad enough that Diana had been shrunk to six inches. It had happened when she was "teamed up" with Booster Gold.

Booster Gold was not a bad guy. Not really. And he did try to help other people. But the main person Booster Gold always helped was Booster Gold. Because Booster Gold had come back to the past so that he could have fame, fortune...

And women.

Normally, Wonder Woman would have been out of Booster's league. But a six inch Wonder Woman...

While Wonder Woman thought about how she would reverse the shrinking spell Circe had put on her, Booster Gold
1534.title: Booster Gold

154.content:
There are several universes out there, both like and unlike our own. Some universes have superheroes, others have laws of physics which prevent superheroes from ever existing.

Fortunately, the universe we'll be talking about involves three eighteen year old boys, a bit mischievous but still good natured at heart, as well as a Wonder Woman who bears a remarkable resemblance to a young...
154.title: Mischievous kids

choices: Wonder woman was shrunk out of her costume.
Wonder woman and everything she wore was shrunk.
1543.content:
The Universe where the "Lucy Lawless" Wonder Woman reigned supreme was probably a tad darker than the universes one saw on television or the earlier comics. There was no Superman or Batman in this universe. The heroes and villains all could have been plucked from the pages of Greek mythology. Technology and magic wove together to create this world, and a sword wielding, shield bashing Wonder Woman kept everyone in line when she had to.

It's also a world where the metric system has taken the world over completely, with no hold outs. So be prepared!

Our story begins with three best friends, Lawrence, Charles and Morris, three eighteen year old skinny white nerds who were all honor students at the Local Academy for Magical Excellence. They were a precocious bunch, who were almost as good as they thought they were. It was that small difference between how good they thought they were and how good they actually were that often got them into trouble.

The boys were rambunctious, but not really bad boys. It was just that one of them would come up with a weird but wild idea, they would egg each other on, and the next thing you knew, they were all three in the headmaster's office, who would warn them time and again they would one day get themselves into trouble that would cost them more than the ten switches a piece he gave to their backsides each time as punishment.

Case in point, Wonder Woman was coming to their school to give a speech. All three boys were infatuated with Wonder Woman, buy who wasn't? But like most of her adoring public, the boys knew they had no chance with Wonder Woman. Any advances they made would be rebuffed.

But what if, Charles suggested, Wonder Woman wasn't in a position to rebuff their advances? Mind control spells wouldn't work. Her will was too strong for that. And she was too physically strong to be restrained. But what if, Charles pondered, Wonder Woman was shrunk down to a mere fifteen centimeters tall? A Wonder Woman that small could be handled and "explored."

So the shrinking of Wonder Woman was studied, debated and finally decided. The boys would sneak into Wonder Woman's dressing room while she gave her speech. When she returned to her dressing room and was all alone, they would cast the shrinking spell on her.

The plan worked like a charm. The boys weren't missed during her speech, since all eyes were on Wonder Woman. And when she returned to her dressing room, as soon as she was alone, the boys stepped out and cast their shrinking spell. Immediately,...
1543.title: Lucy Lawless

15431.content:
Remember when I said it was a darker world?

IWell, in this world, Wonder Woman didn't take kindly to having someone attempting to put a spell on her. She reached brutally, efficiently and with finality.

The boys never bothered anyone again. Read that as you will. And even Wonder Woman's worst enemies never thought of trying to put a shrinking spell on her. Not after her reaction that night.
15431.title: Nothing happened

info.brief_description: Have you ever wanted to shrink a woman? Now you can!

Several lovely ladies have been reduced to doll size. Some by accident and some by sneaky mischievous kids or adults. Babysitters, housewifes, secretary's, policewomen, etc
Here are some weird stories about a few!
Enjoy!
